title: Single of The Week: Hot Chip
content:
I Feel Better, the second single from the latest Hot Chip LP may not be a huge detachment from the usual Hot Chip sound, but with a sound so wonderful this is hardly a bad thing. Filled with uplifting strings and a snappy beat, the lyrics intertwine around the instrumentation with grace and delicacy. Again this isnâ€™t most original sounding Hot Chip record ever conceived, but the ringing steal pans and intertwining harmonies will no doubt bring you back for more.
